data.actual_result: Video controls are gone and you can only go back using the "swipe from left to right" motion
data.expected_result: Clicking on the share button should not affect the video controls
data.short_description: Video controls not working if Share button has been pressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on an uploaded video attachment ( or similar) - Before the video is fully loaded and fullscreened (tiny video, not the white screen) press on the Share button
